posts.title: React Router - Feature Overview
HTML for Dummies: A Simple Introduction
posts.content:
Every HTML page starts with a simple structure. Hereâ€™s what it looks like: ```html My First Webpage

Hello, World!

This is a paragraph on my first webpage.

``` Breakdown: ``: This tells the browser that you're using HTML5, the latest version of HTML. ``: This tag wraps everything that makes up your webpage. ``: Contains meta-information about your page, like the title. ``: The text that appears in the browser tab. `<body>`: Everything inside the `<body>` tag is what shows up on the webpage itself. `<h1>`: A heading tag. `<h1>` is the biggest, and there are other headings like `<h2>`, `<h3>`, etc. `<p>`: A paragraph tag. This is used to display blocks of text.
